sqlMap.insert: insert into board(boardnum, title, id, contents, file_path, hits) VALUES( board_seq.NEXTVAL, #title#, #id#, #contents#, #file_path#, #hits# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM( SELECT boardnum, title, id, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') regdate, hits FROM board
WHERE $searchType$ like '%' || #searchText# || '%'
) a ) b
WHERE rn >= $startIndex$ and rn <= $endIndex$
sqlMap.update: update board set hits= hits+1 WHERE boardnum=#boardnum#

UPDATE board set title=#title# ,contents=#contents# ,updatedate=TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss')
WHERE boardnum = #boardnum#
